properties.condaFile:
name: python-ml-basic-cpu
channels:
  - conda-forge
dependencies:
  - python=3.8
  - pip
  - pip:
    - numpy
    - pandas
    - scipy
    - scikit-learn
    - matplotlib
    - xgboost
    - lightgbm
    - dask
    - distributed
    - dask-ml
    - adlfs
    - fastparquet
    - pyarrow
    - mlflow
    - azureml-mlflow
    - azureml-dataprep
properties.description: user created environment with docker image
